questions.question: Which sentence is written correctly?

choices.answer: would you like to go to the park after school
Would you like to go to the park after school
would you like to go to the park after school?

questions.question: Which sentence is written correctly?

choices.answer: This weekend, I am going to go see the new Star Wars movie.
This weekend I am going to go see the new star wars movie.
This weekend I am going to go see the new star wars movie.
This weekend I am going to go see the new "Star Wars movie.

questions.question: Which sentence is written correctly using quotation marks?

choices.answer: My mom asked, "Did you brush your hair?"
"My mom asked did you brush your hair"
My mom asked "Did you brush your hair?"
My mom asked, "did you brush your hair?"

questions.question: Which sentence is written correctly:

choices.answer: My favorite Frozen characters are Sven, Anna and Olaf.
My favorite Frozen characters are sven, anna, and olaf.
My favorite Frozen characters are Sven, Anna, and Olaf.
My favorite frozen characters are sven anna and olaf.

questions.question: Which of the following uses the introductory word correctly?

choices.answer: No, I do not want soup for dinner.

no, I do not want soup for dinner.
no I do not want soup for dinner.

choices.answer: "Miss Payovich, said We don't have fun in here."

choices.answer: Underlined
In Italics
Nothing

questions.question: When do you use quotation marks?

choices.answer: Every time you write a sentence.
Only when you say hi to someone.
Never.
Before and after the exact words someone says.

questions.question: Which punctuation is missing from the sentence?
When is a comma needed in a sentence?

choices.answer: When you list 3 or more items in a series.
In a compound sentence, before a fanboy.
Between what someone is saying and who is saying it.
All of the above.

choices.answer: an exclamation mark
commas between math, science, and art.
commas between math, science, and art AND a before BUT.
